title: AMO Queue Helper
name: amoqueue
description: Enhancements to the AMO review queue
author: Philipp Kewisch

preferences.name: queueinfo-enable
preferences.title: Enable Queue enhancements
preferences.description: Makes various improvements to the queue page

preferences.name: staletime
preferences.title: Hours to keep information
preferences.description: Review information older than this amount of hours will get removed

preferences.name: per-page
preferences.title: Items per page
preferences.description: Number of items to show in the queue per page

preferences.name: addons-per-load
preferences.title: Items per load
preferences.description: Number of items to load when clicking the load button

preferences.name: tabclose-other-queue
preferences.title: Close duplicate queue tabs
preferences.description: Close duplicate queue tabs when a new one is loaded

preferences.name: tabclose-review-children
preferences.title: Close review child tabs
preferences.description: Close review child tabs (e.g. file browser) when review is closed

preferences.name: compare-enable
preferences.title: Enable compare grid
preferences.description: Adds a grid to review pages that allows quick comparison between versions

preferences.name: compare-command-args
preferences.title: Compare tool arguments
preferences.description: Please use $1 and $2 to specify the file names.
